function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to inadequate iaq measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and quarantine measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental pollution due to lockdown measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on open windows for high ventilation rates","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of preventive measures such as social distancing and mask-wearing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in covid-19 cases after relaxation of preventive measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired infections due to airborne chemical and microbiological pollutants","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to occupational diseases among health care workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor air quality leading to the ingress of pollutants into the indoor environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and accumulation of airborne pathogens","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient air filtration technology contributing to indoor air pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air not effectively removed","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization of air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate distribution of treated air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear effectiveness of air purification technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse or improper maintenance of uvgi technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv radiation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of uvc radiation due to virus concealment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of uvgi for disinfection may not be effective for covid-19 virus in real-life scenarios due to the virus being concealed from direct uvc light","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The prolonged exposure to uvgi at dosages ranging from 1000 to 3000 mj/cm 2 may pose health risks to individuals if not used properly","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The susceptibility of coronavirus to uv irradiation, while effective, may not eliminate the risk of disease transmission through other means, such as surface contamination and airborne particles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ineffective air filters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper installation of air filters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of air filters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hepa filters and pre-filters in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of electrostatic smoke precipitators esp and electrostatic air filters es in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on air conditioning systems for thermal comfort","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate review of construction, design, and maintenance of hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air supply in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration due to low merv filters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ozone generators, electrostatic precipitators, and ionizers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of epidemic through air conditioning systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tuberculosis in a hospital ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uv lights and ionizers in preventing tb transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with prolonged exposure to uv lights and negative ionizers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of tb in clinical settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nosocomial transmission and occupational tb in resource-limited settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Congregating highly susceptible individuals with those likely to have tb disease","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expense of negative-pressure mechanical ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate dependency of natural ventilation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of upper-room uv light in healthcare facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exhaust vents positioned in the lower part of the room may lead to air contamination and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wire mesh floors in animal cages may not effectively prevent faecal-oral transmission of tb.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of uv lights and their maintenance may expose healthcare staff and
